resources.string: How do you want to decide?

"Got a few ideas but undecided which to pick?
Let the app pick for you.

"
If you specified a decision type as default, the window will no longer show. This is where you can change it.
Do you give permission to the developer to allow crash reports to be automatically sent so they can diagnose what happened.
Do you give permission to allow the developer to see what is used in the app. This makes it easier in future to know what extra features can be made depending upon features currently used.
Are you sure you want to delete all options?
You have only added one option. Maybe you should add another option so it\'s a surprise.
"Make your life easier by adding in your decisions and let the app decide for you.\n\nTo help the developer, the app needs to ask your permission to do 2 things."
